name: A Decade Of Album Cover Design Limited Edition Book + CD + Poster
description:
Stock arriving mid December - please contact us for earliest delivery time.

1. A Decade Of Album Cover Design Book
12" vinyl LP sized, premium quality, full colour hand bound book. Hardback premium gold foil stamped cover. 112 pages beautifully printed on high quality heavy matte paper. Introductory essay by Stealth Magazine's founder and editor Mark Pollard. Testimonials by Suffa (Hilltop Hoods), Pegz (Obese Records) and Bliss (Bliss N Eso). Australian Hip Hop artist's personal thoughts and insights for their respective projects. Collects many of the cover designs A77 has created for a who's who of the Australian Hip Hop scene and other genres. Includes supplementary artwork, single covers, logos, concepts and alternates never seen or printed before.

The only book of its kind which catalogues the past decade of releases and artwork for many of the biggest names in the fastest growing genre of music in Australia - this is truly a limited collector's item and will be highly sought after for lovers of design, fans of Australian Hip Hop and music in general.

Click here to take a closer look at the book.

2. A Decade Of Album Cover Design Poster
Limited Edition Vinyl LP sized Frame-able Poster Print

3. DJ 2Buck "The Cornerstone" CD
The Cornerstone showcases some of the illest joints to come out of Australia, with exclusive drops and appearances by some of Australian Hip Hop's biggest names, cut up and mixed by the legendary DJ 2Buck. This limited edition CD features original artwork by A77 and is available exclusively with the purchase of the April77 Creative "A Decade of Album Cover Design" book.

International orders: please contact us.

description:

4. A77 Letterpress Cards - Series of 3
Size (each card): 148mm W x 198mm H. These limited edition A77 letterpress cards are printed on 600gsm Crane Lettra. Imported direct from the United States, Lettra is the premium choice of paper stocks for letterpress around the world. Save $10 on retail price!

Click here to take a closer look at the cards.

International orders: please contact us.

name: A Decade Of Album Cover Design Limited Edition Book + CD + Poster + Dialectrix Satellite Black Vinyl
description:
Stock arriving mid December - please contact us for earliest delivery time.

1. A Decade Of Album Cover Design Book
12" vinyl LP sized, premium quality, full colour hand bound book. Hardback premium gold foil stamped cover. 112 pages beautifully printed on high quality heavy matte paper. Introductory essay by Stealth Magazine's founder and editor Mark Pollard. Testimonials by Suffa (Hilltop Hoods), Pegz (Obese Records) and Bliss (Bliss N Eso). Australian Hip Hop artist's personal thoughts and insights for their respective projects. Collects many of the cover designs A77 has created for a who's who of the Australian Hip Hop scene and other genres. Includes supplementary artwork, single covers, logos, concepts and alternates never seen or printed before.

The only book of its kind which catalogues the past decade of releases and artwork for many of the biggest names in the fastest growing genre of music in Australia - this is truly a limited collector's item and will be highly sought after for lovers of design, fans of Australian Hip Hop and music in general.

Click here to take a closer look at the book.

2. A Decade Of Album Cover Design Poster
Limited Edition Vinyl LP sized Frame-able Poster Print

3. DJ 2Buck "The Cornerstone" CD
The Cornerstone showcases some of the illest joints to come out of Australia, with exclusive drops and appearances by some of Australian Hip Hop's biggest names, cut up and mixed by the legendary DJ 2Buck. This limited edition CD features original artwork by A77 and is available exclusively with the purchase of the April77 Creative "A Decade of Album Cover Design" book.

4. Dialectrix "Satellite" EP - Black Vinyl
Limited edition 5 track vinyl EP - each track featuring an overseas producer with raps by Dialectrix. Featured producers include Suff Daddy (Germany), Eric Lau (UK), Mr Thing (UK), Haz Beats (NZ) & Exile (US). Artwork by April77 Creative - this Limited Edition release includes the Triple J hits 'Stop' and 'What Is This World Coming To?'. Save $10 on retail price!

Click here to take a closer look at 'Satellite'.

International orders: please contact us.

name: A77 Letterpress Cards - Limited Edition Series of 3 - Full Set
description:
Size (each card): 148mm W x 198mm H

These limited edition A77 letterpress cards are printed on 600gsm Crane Lettra. Imported direct from the United States, Lettra is the premium choice of paper stocks for letterpress around the world. The designs featured on the cards are a unique extension of the April77 diamond brand, and also presents the first printed application of the updated A77 colours.

Click here to take a closer look at the cards.

Purchase price does not include framing.

Australian orders: free shipping.
International orders: please contact us.
